comments:
Driver:  0419I + v2004_0420_1550 for jst.ws and wst.ws.

in the workspace.  Here's the error I got:

Kathy, 
I suspect this is was just a 'in-between' drivers instability bug.  The reason 
is that its complaining about an AbstractMethodError.  I experienced a Missing 
Method error in the same class and when I grabbed the latest code from HEAD, it 
went away.

If you find this error doesn't appear in more recent integration builds, I 
think it's safe to resolve this bug.
Agree.  I don't see this bug anymore with more recent drivers.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
